item.description: 0:01 Hi, I’m Erica Ramirez. Founder billion, host of What About Your Friends, a brand new show on the ringer podcast Network dedicated to the many lives of friendship and how its portrayed in pop culture every Wednesday, on the ringer dish feet. I’ll be talking with my best friend, Steven Othello and your favorites from within the ringer. 0:17 And Beyond about friendships on TV and movies, pop culture, and our real lives.

item.description: 0:01 Did your favorite NFL team? Win the Super Bowl? No. Then the NFL draft is your Super Bowl. I’m Danny Heifetz, and for now, until the draft, we are turning our fantasy football show. Feed into the ringer NFL draft, show every Tuesday and Thursday, we talk about the top players.
